entry.title: Hello, world!
entry.content:
Hello, my name is Brian and this is my blog!
I had a blog from my high school days, but I've been meaning to re-start the blog for a while now. I'm finishing up my last semester at Cooper and working at Red Balloon Security while I do.

I do have some ideas for blog posts, mostly some of the projects I've recently done or been working on.
For my senior project at school, I am building a PCIe card with an FPGA on it that users and upload different bitstreams on it to.. do different things... We call it RASAC, Reconfigurable Application Specific Accelerator Card.

Another project (that I have recently finished), is the BUUL (Brian's JUUL). It is supposed to be a JUUL clone. I've also built an Alexa controlled power outlet, just because, even though you can just buy them on Amazon... I also have interests on rocketry, so hopefully there'll be posts on that.

So I guess that's for now
73,
-KD2LSL
